controlAndCollectionSite

Interface IOrdinaryThief

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControlAndCollectionSite, ControlAndCollectionSiteProxy, ControlAndCollectionSiteServer

    public interface IOrdinaryThief
    Ordinary Thief Interface of ControlAndCollection Site Instance.
    Author:
    Tiago Henriques nmec: 73046; Miguel Oliveira nmec: 72638

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handACanvas(boolean hasCanvas, int roomId, int partyId, int thiefId)
      In Ordinary Thief life cycle, transition between "outside" and "outside" While Master Thief is resting, the Ordinary Thief that has arrived has to wait until he wakes up.

    • Method Detail

      • handACanvas

        void handACanvas(boolean hasCanvas,
                 int roomId,
                 int partyId,
                 int thiefId)
        In Ordinary Thief life cycle, transition between "outside" and "outside" While Master Thief is resting, the Ordinary Thief that has arrived has to wait until he wakes up. When he does, reset that party. If that ordinary thief returns with a canvas, the number of collected canvas is increased by the Master Thief and that room is set to rob again because there are still paitings left on that room to retrieve. If the ordinary thief doesn't return a canvas it means that the room is now empty and the room is set to empty.
        Parameters:
        hasCanvas - - True if thief has canvas; False otherwise
        roomId - - Room Identifier
        partyId - - Assault Party Identifier
        thiefId - - Thief Identifier
